narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Fard Health Services LLC is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.4M in Medicaid payments across 21K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.4M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
